Wow, that's awesome. Does the turret rotate?

Repped!

EDIT: Sorry, I have to wait 24 hours .\_.

> 
> Wow, that's awesome. Does the turret rotate?
> Repped!
> 
> EDIT: Sorry, I have to wait 24 hours .\_.

Thank you. And yes, the turret does rotate on a stock bearing.

So, how long till someone builds an Abrams?![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)

Ah, the Challenger. The finest piece of English killing machines... Except for the Challenger 2.

God save us, the queen can clearly take care of herself!
